entry.title: Experiment in STT!
entry.content: This is just a experiment to check if a new blog post is showing up in the webpage or not

entry.title: Website in Software Class!
entry.content:
I am currently attending my Software Tools lecture. All my friends are asleep as they don’t take this class seriously at all. I feel a little sad about it as I feel that this class is pretty cool.

I hope I continue to learn more about this tool!
entry.summary: I am currently attending my Software Tools lecture. All my friends are asleep as they don’t take this class seriously at all. I feel a little sad about it as I feel that this class is pretty cool. def print_hi(name) print("Hi,I am just trying the default template in jekyll page ") I hope I continue to learn more about this tool!
